OOC - Yeah, conjoined sparks are pretty much unknown =
on Cybertron, unless you're a high end tech or medic.  I'm pretty sure his =
scanners, while they would detect it, he's not technically inclined enough =
to realize it has Megatron's spark and another in it.

So, basically he's s=
canning for Megatron's spark, but because the reading is not the exact same=

s not that bright as far as tech goes, he's just leaping to teh conclusion =
it's not Megatron.

At this point, VICE GRIP hissed, "Galvatron and Megatron=

n, seeing he was surrounded, "What sort of ludicrous assembly have you forc=

logize for what I will do to free him from whatever you have forced him to,=
 CDriminal!"  Thinking if tehre was anything 'here' it was the diong of CRY=
OTEK!

At this point, his body powering up then as he went to ready himsel =
ffor a fight with HYDRAS..

Not aware of the overrides that CRYOTEK had put=
 within him!

At this point, DINOBOT walked back along with IGUANAS as he t=
ook a few steps back around the rapidly forming battle circle, "Pah.  Thsi =
will be a useless combat.  I wish for something more entertaining."  The be=
